invite.title: Invite
invite.description: The referred wallet must be funded with at least $50 to be valid.

qa.q: How do I register for the airdrop?
qa.a:
Become a Vultisig user and join the airdrop calculation.

Note: The airdrop is based on the total amount in your vault multiplied by the time in the wallet. The largest amounts for the longest time earn the most.
Read more about this here

qa.q: What assets are counted for the Airdrop?
qa.a:
Layer1 assets and most tokens supported by Vultisig are counted. Other assets such as LPs and Node Bonds from THORChain, MAYA Protocol and ChainFlip are also valid.

See the full list here
Your assets will accumulate VULTIES over a period of 12 months. At the end of this period, you will receive your share of the airdrop (10% of $VULT).

qa.q: What information is collected by Vultisig?
qa.a:
You are registering your Public Keys and vault addresses.

Inspect the code here.

No other information is collected.

Read the Privacy Policy here

balance.title: Total balance
balance.description: The balance is updated once a day.

empty.title: Wallet not connected

error.title: Something is wrong
descriptions: Sorry, but the app you're looking for is currently experiencing some technical difficulties

access-denied.title: Access by invitation only
descriptions: Please note that in order to log in, a referral code is required. You can find this code by searching for #VultisigBot on various social networks.
